momentum.ascending: You've been building serious momentum lately, finishing the year stronger than you started.
momentum.descending: Your recent rhythm softened toward the end of the year. That's often a signal for recalibration—not failure.
momentum.stable: Your consistency has remained remarkably stable throughout the transitions of the year.
momentum.main: This year, your identity centered around [[{{habitName}}]]. {{momentumMsg}}

rhythm.weekend: You find your best rhythm on the weekends—that's when your identity truly shines.
rhythm.weekday: You are a weekday warrior, but the weekends tend to be a 'blind spot' for your habits.
rhythm.consistent: You maintain a consistent rhythm throughout the entire week, from Monday to Sunday.

consistency.high: You've shown up on [[{{activeDays}}]] days so far this year — enough to form real identity momentum.
consistency.medium: You have the spark. With slightly more rhythm, this could become automatic.
consistency.low: You're laying foundations. Early consistency matters more than volume.

annual.experimental: You experimented broadly this year. That curiosity is a strength — narrowing focus may unlock consistency.
annual.fading: Your consistency with [[{{habitName}}]] has dropped significantly recently. If this was intentional, that’s clarity. If not, a small restart could bring it back into focus.
annual.neglected: You haven't logged [[{{habitName}}]] for [[{{days}}]] days. When it makes sense, a small revisit is enough.

intro.elite: You're operating at an elite level with [[{{count}}]] actions so far this week. Your habits aren't just actions; they are your identity.
intro.strong: Strong consistency with [[{{count}}]] completions. You're showing up for yourself, and the momentum is visible.
intro.balanced: A week of balance ([[{{count}}]] completions). Some foundations held firm, others were tested. Re-centering is part of the process.
intro.low: A low-velocity week with [[{{count}}]] completions. These are often periods of rest or resistance—either way, they are data for a better next week.

momentum.highlight: Your identity was strongest in [[{{habitName}}]] this week, with [[{{count}}/{{total}}]] days completed so far.

weekly.neglected: You haven't logged [[{{habitName}}]] yet this week. A small 2-minute version of it tomorrow could restart the rhythm.

growth.recovery: You finished the week stronger than you started. That's 'recovery capacity' in action.
growth.friction: You had a powerful start, but the weekend brought some friction. Identifying that 'Friday fade' is the first step to mastering it.

intro.exceptional: A month of exceptional focus ([[{{count}}]] completions so far). You've successfully integrated these habits into your lifestyle.
intro.solid: Solid progress this month. With [[{{count}}]] total completions, you've established a strong baseline of consistency.
intro.exploration: A month of exploration. [[{{count}}]] completions shows effort, but there's room to tighten your rhythm for next month.
intro.low: A low-momentum month. Use the [[{{count}}]] completions you did manage as architectural data for a more sustainable next month.

momentum.growth: You've seen a [[{{delta}}%]] growth since last month—that's significant identity shifting in action.
momentum.cooling: Your rhythm cooled by [[{{delta}}%]] this month. This is often a sign of life-balance adjusting; use it to recalibrate.

rhythm.anchor: You were most dedicated to [[{{habitName}}]] this month, showing up [[{{count}}]] times. That is your current anchor.

habitManager.title: My Habits
habitManager.noHabits: No habits yet. Start by adding one!
habitManager.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this habit? You will lose all its historical data.
